revised_title: Improving Agricultural Yield Through Physiological Crop Selection and Breeding
tldr: This article discusses the importance of understanding plant growth and temperature relations to improve agricultural yield. It highlights the need for breeding crops with better ability to grow in cool conditions and the potential benefits of selecting crops with higher yields of metabolizable energy and protein. The authors also emphasize the importance of considering environmental factors when determining crop distribution to maximize yields.
